headline: Ameresco Appointed as Engineering Service Provider for Kimberly-Clark UK Hydrogen Boiler Projects
summary: FRAMINGHAM, Mass. & TADWORTH, England, September 18, 2025--Ameresco, Inc. (NYSE: AMRC), a leading energy solutions provider, has secured a contract with Kimberly-Clark UK to serve as the Engineering Service Provider for the design and construction phases of the UK's first Green Hydrogen Program in the consumer goods sector.
